# Foundation AI for mission critical decisions
Single AI model to understand spaces, monitor service processes, forecast accurately, and guarantee efficiency.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/6408e28f740642020a08f005_hero_overlay-01.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/6408e28f74064256c908f006_hero_overlay-02.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/6408e28f7406426ad908f007_hero_overlay-03.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/6408e28f740642b65508f008_hero_overlay-04.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/64e2b02ed1d1b88ce6a5191a_Base.webp)
[Request A Demo](https://www.zensors.com/<https:/www.zensors.com/company/contact-zensors-ai-team>)
Operational Efficiencies
Strategic Planning
Financial Performance
Safety & Sustainability
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/65f2144156c46e7317634a6b_V2.2_Frame-27331%20\(1\).gif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/65f214b31f9e963fc14097a8_Unnamed-file%20\(1\).gif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/65f2134ce4b6c5a7f4cb79e9_Zensors-AI-Financial-Performance.gif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/65f214b7c81a7f9f09327c80_Unnamed-file.gif)
## AI for precision control over large complex spaces
Activate industry-specific, pre-trained AI to understand spaces, provide unparalleled real-time operational support and forecast accurately to guaranteein efficiency, safety and fast time-to-value.
[![Zensors AI for airports](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/64cd747e94461659b9989f35_Card%20A%20-%202.webp)**For Aviation & Transit**](https://www.zensors.com/</ai-solutions/aviation>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/64cd747d38bf64390870f0be_Card%20A%20-%201.webp)**For Retail**](https://www.zensors.com/</ai-solutions/retail>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/6408e28f74064291b408eff6_offices1.webp)**For Large Commercial Facilities**](https://www.zensors.com/</ai-solutions/cre>)
## Fusion of first & third party data
Zensors processes data from sensors, cameras and other devices, combining it with text and metadata from data warehouses into a standardized, aligned data format.
[Contact us](https://www.zensors.com/</company/contact-zensors-ai-team>)[Learn more](https://www.zensors.com/</zensors-ai-platform/how-zensors-computer-vision-works>)
![Dashboard mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/65f73fb221e5ea2f014f937d_FoundationAI_section_1.png)
![Dashboard mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/65f3933b000384878f14f032_FoundationAI_section_2.png)
## Multimodal AI grounded in spatial understanding
AI that runs across video, time-series and text to create an understanding of the spaces and activities that are core to your business.
[Contact us](https://www.zensors.com/</company/contact-zensors-ai-team>)[Learn more](https://www.zensors.com/</zensors-ai-platform/spatial-ai-data-platform-features>)
## AI virtual manager to deliver smart actions
Automate operational decisions with AI copilot. Enable your operations team to act instantly instead of “trying to decide what to do.”
[Contact us](https://www.zensors.com/</company/contact-zensors-ai-team>)[Learn more](https://www.zensors.com/</zensors-ai-platform/features>)
![Dashboard mockup](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/65f3933b3ec059d9f1ccbc7b_FoundationAI_section_3.png)
## Why companies choose Zensors
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/64091d29b8c50c3e8c2cd1e3_Intelligent_Alert.svg)
### Replace a dozen point solutions with a single AI
Multi-purpose foundation AI can replace several legacy devices like LIDAR, Beacons, and other traditional CV point solution providers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/64baf36242ff8ab7c7050f53_rank.svg)
### High accuracy out of the box on day one
No extensive re-training or turning required, as Zensors AI is trained on billions of images, videos, and text data specific to each vertical.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/640f90fcd1722ba2ef4f6c47_shield-check.svg)
### Unlocking value while maintaining privacy
Designed to deliver actionable insights to IT, Operations, and Business stakeholders while maintaining the anonymity of individual customers.
## Trusted by global companies
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6408e28f740642481808efdf/6601fe6d248b6691c473b16e_Toronto_Pearson_International_Airport-Logo.wine%201%20\(1\).png)

generated_description:
Zensors is an innovative company on a mission to leverage AI to make sense of and automate interactions in the physical world. Founded in 2019 and located in San Francisco, Zensors is part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, which speaks to its potential and credibility. With a lean team of just 12 employees, Zensors has quickly made strides in the field of artificial intelligence—specifically in AI operations (AIOps).

The company’s core offerings revolve around understanding space and operational processes using advanced AI technologies. They focus on multiple areas, including:

1. **Multimodal AI**: This involves processing and understanding video, text, and time-series data to create a comprehensive picture of environments and activities essential for business operations.
2. **Spatial AI**: They structure unstructured data from various sources, integrating inputs from sensors and cameras to deliver standardized insights.
3. **Virtual Management**: Zensors has developed an AI copilot that automates decision-making processes in real-time, allowing operational teams to act swiftly rather than debate what to do next.

Their solutions cater broadly to different sectors, including aviation, retail, and commercial real estate, helping businesses optimize operations, enhance customer experiences, and ensure safety—all while maintaining individual privacy.

Zensors' unique positioning lies in its ability to replace numerous legacy solutions (like LiDAR and beacons) with a single, comprehensive AI model that boasts high accuracy right out of the box. This makes it an enticing option for companies looking to streamline their operations efficiently.

Backed by influential partners like Jared Friedman from Y Combinator, Zensors is well-poised for growth. They emphasize customer-centricity and provide resources to guide enterprises in AI adoption, ensuring organizations find value without compromising on privacy or efficiency.

For more information, you can explore their website at [Zensors.com](https://www.zensors.com) to see their products, solutions, and career opportunities.
